original_title: Banda Girls: Who's Your Sugar Daddy?
overview: In this reality-based series, the five feisty Banda Girls (Brenda, Samantha, Celina, Esther and Mary) are forced to go looking for a sugar daddy when Brenda's wealthy boyfriend asks her to marry him and she says "no." Fortunately, they've got the assets to help them find another guy â€¦ in fact, they could end up with several. The soundtrack includes songs by Mexican artists such as El Mayo de la Sierra, Banda Jerez and more.
title: Banda Girls: Who's Your Sugar Daddy?
